      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CatastropheBuilder uiReadyCatastrophe()
      Returns a catastrophe builder with the following fields set Active: true Name: unique name of the form cat_N Number: unique number of the form cat#_N Description: unique number of the form Catastrophe N Type: a random but deterministic catastrophe type ValidFrom: a unique past date ValidTo: a unique future date

    • Method Detail

      • uiReadyCatastrophe

        public static CatastropheBuilder uiReadyCatastrophe()
        Returns a catastrophe builder with the following fields set
        • Active: true
        • Name: unique name of the form cat_N
        • Number: unique number of the form cat#_N
        • Description: unique number of the form Catastrophe N
        • Type: a random but deterministic catastrophe type
        • ValidFrom: a unique past date
        • ValidTo: a unique future date
        Returns:
        a new CatastropheBuilder

      • withActive

        public CatastropheBuilder withActive(boolean active)
        Sets wheter a catastrophe can be assigned to a new claim.
        Parameters:
        active - the desired value
        Returns:
        the modified builder
